parse.title: The Lord of the Rings: War in the North (Soundtrack)

links.*: The Lord of the Rings: War in the North

wikitext.*:
'''''The Lord of the Rings: War in the North''''' is the soundtrack to ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]''. The soundtrack is available on iTunes and on [[Amazon.com Incorporated|Amazon]]. All tracks were composed by [[Inon Zur]] and recorded in the Abbey Road studios.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.warinthenorth.com/index.php/soundtrack|articlename=Original Game Soundtrack|dated=|website=warinthenorth.com|accessed=22 February 2012}}</ref>
